nodes.text: Around 21 BBY, a Spaceport police droid responded to an emergency call from a spaceport restaurant, Plop Dribble's on planet Stobar's spaceport, after a Dathomirian Zabrak, Savage Opress, nearly choked a waitress to death. By the time the droid arrived, Savage had already fled the scene.

Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker and Padawan Ahsoka Tano later arrived at the restaurant and the owner, Loubo, warned them to stay away from the fainted waitress. Seconds later, this droid arrived and scolded the owner for pointing a frying pan at the Jedi.

The droid first appeared in the twenty-first episode of the Star Wars: The Clone Wars television series' fourth season, titled "Brothers". He was voiced by Tom Kane, the actor who also portrays Jedi Master Yoda in the series.
